definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="enchant_levels">enchant_levels</variable><variable type="MCItem" id="emeralds">emeralds</variable><variable type="MCItem" id="tool">tool</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_checkgamemode"><field name="gamemode">SURVIVAL</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:ProklytiiMetallIngot</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.7</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:PilnyiPoroshok</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
